description: Jason Myers drills a 52-yard field goal as time expires to give Seattle the win after a sideline catch review.
Kyler Murray finds Emari Demercado leaking out, and he sprints to the pylon for the game-tying touchdown with 28 seconds left.
On 4th down, Michael Wilson makes a spectacular one-handed grab to keep Arizonaâ€™s late drive alive.
An interception is fumbled back and, after review, the ruling stands for Arizona amid confusion and a premature Seahawks celebration.
Jason Myers misses a late field goal that would have made it a two-score game, keeping Arizona within striking distance.
